title: React blog
description: Blog made using Eeact for the client and Express for the backend, with auth system and rich text editor
stack: React - Redux - React-router - Express - Mongodb - Cloudinary - Ajv JSON schema validator - slateJS
features: Spa with multiple routes - Auth system using refresh tokens - Assets optimization using cloudinary - Rich text editor using slateJS

title: Shop static site
description: Simple site using html, js and scss
features: Responsive - Data display based on user interaction
